summary: Racial tensions break out on 31st Street, a multi-ethnic community.
cast: Dick Powell|Theodore Bikel|Arthur O'Connell|Carroll O'Connor|Peter Whitney|Milton Selzer|Strother Martin|Karl Swenson|Dabbs Greer|Margaret Field|Adrienne Marden|Kathleen Freeman|Nancy DeCarl|Kurt Russell|Eddie Rosson|Miriam Goldina|Chris Carter|Shari Lee Bernath
title: Pericles on 31st Street
